name: Mindbees
overview:
Mind Bees is a web design and development firm based in Cochin, India. Our company prides itself on the relationship it has with each of its customers, with customer satisfaction our top priority in business. The Mind Bees team is trained in the areas of web design and development, as well as graphic design and content management. We consider each customer different and pour our heart and soul into meeting their needs to the highest possible standard.

We offers,

Open Source Customization includes Joomla customization, Drupal customization, PHPBB customization, WHMCS customization, Wordpress customization, PHPMotion customization

Web Development services includes PHP and MySQL development, Ecommerce solutions, Dynamic web application, E-Portal and CMS, Database solutions, Search engine optimization
